item.title: 'Bachelor in Paradise' 2025: Who got roses on last night's episode
item.description: Last week’s episode of "Bachelor in Paradise"raised the stakes for the contestants, who now all have a chance at going home up to $500,000 richer, depending on how strong their relationships become in the next few weeks.

item.title: VOTE: Who would you pick to be No. 1 on The Big 15 list for 2025
item.description: The Sarasota Herald-Tribune unveiled its The Big 15 list of the Sarasota-Manatee counties' top college football recruits entering the 2025 high school football season. To see the full listCLICK HERE

item.title: Cardinal Mooney-Aquinas game voted best 2025 matchup to watch
item.description: There are plenty of quality games on the high school football slates this year in Manatee and Sarasota counties. Out of all the games, theHerald-Tribuneselected 14 marquee matchupsfor the 2025 football season, including a couple of preseason classics.

item.title: Bradenton shooting, stabbing hospitalizes 2 after family argument
item.description: The Manatee County Sheriff’s Office isinvestigating after one person was shotand another was stabbed in Bradenton on August 12.

item.title: Allegiant announces new nonstop flight from SRQ
item.description: The Sarasota Bradenton International Airport announced a new Allegiant flight Tuesday, connecting Sarasota and Rochester, New York, with one-way fares as low as $59. The route is set to begin flying Feb. 13, 2026.

item.title: Venice-based Tervis Tumbler sold; headquarters moving to Bradenton
item.description: OSPREY – JV2 Innovative Products, a two-month old Wilmington, Delaware-based company, announced thepurchase Tuesday of a majority stake in Tervis Tumber, the family-owned south Sarasota County drinkware company founded in 1946.
